post.body: I don't see Chatterbox and Bryant Lake Bowl on the Minneapolis pubster!
No, Monday.
Everyone still coming to MMCA Art Supply Raiser?
you can but it costs extra. I paid to have it adjusted to biz card size cos I didn't know how it would turn out otherwise.
lmao
it's the company name!
D
we're Christians if that's what you're asking. It's not a selling point though. We don't do that.
turned out awesome.
36$ if you adjust your psd to fit std biz card size. 60$ if they have to do it. :(
what did you change?
3 hours, eh? That will probably make up for them making me wait til January to see the show.
I am writing a cms for http://www.michaelyoungblood.net
Pleased as a plumb to know.
Spotlight is AWESOME, but it's not the right tool for what I wanted to do.
Love your new buddy icon
ugh. those @%^&$ers. it seriously brings me almost to tears what's wrong with this world today. (@vanessahooray - re:dtw bailout)
it still pisses me off the spin doctors didn't ever change the name from 'bailout' to 'rescue package' like they did for banks
sorry it took me a while, but I answered your question about the bird in a facebook note.
YESSS good job dude
it's simple physics, leslie. Ugh!
fuck that shit
and east lansing mi! Hmph!
Still looks like there's a problem.
oh shi
maturing, i guess.
I am determined to.
:)!!!! get macports and git, too!
http://tinyurl.com/9yrnz2 An interesting approach to teaching grammar
really? Thought you were leaving tomorrow :(
what.
yes, of course!
BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM
ooh music server. That would be a fun project. Connect your iPhone remote to it ;) if you have one.
I'm really sorry to hear that. If you have copies laying around, I'd love one
Oh you're talking about Spotlight/Quicksilver. Duh. Yea, not a fan of quicksilver, don't "get" it compared to Spotlight
I also found out my ZiYa plugin has guages, including a thermometer one, exactly what I pictured.
Still burgin for that meatloaf.
I wonder how much ink and paper meijer is wasting by automatically printing gift receipts at the u scans?
Hanukkah cards are dirt cheap! I wish everyone on my list was Jewish!
Cards for all! http://twitpic.com/rxvx
Oh shit I just realized I don't get the jokes on hunukkah cards.
Buying art supplies and Christmas/Chanukah cards.
Legit as fuck: http://twitpic.com/rxoh
So, do I send 8 Chanukah cards, or just one?
While listening to table for glasses. http://twitpic.com/rxcq
Michelle Trachtenberg lookin damn good these days.
LOST season 4 is coming up. I can't even remember what happened in the previous seasons anymore. Thanks, ABC schedule managers!
Switching between Lost and House over a delicious bowl of mac n cheese.
With accomplishment comes reward! www.michaelyoungblood.net is going to come back better than ever!
TinyMCE, don't screw up my FTP transfer, please.
Soooooo proud of my progress today. Much much cleaner backend in my first RoR application!
Feels really good to write an app by hand sometimes. Obviously if you're trying to be rapid, use FW scaffold. Otherwise, still agile.
TinyMCE is killing my SVN repo. So big it times out half way through. Happens in FTP, too. Hate it.
Dear (other) Christians: a theory is NOT a guess. Stop using that argument, you sound stupid. Thanks! Joe.
Dear (other) christians: Bio Evolution is NOT a theory or explanation for the CAUSE of life. Ergo, it is not on par with creationism. - Joe.
If the auto companies were in NYC, Chicago, or LA, they probably would have gotten the money, tbqh
Punish AIG for sending their execs to that resort, take their money back and give it to The Big Three.
Dear non-cycling friends: cyclists = people on bikes. bikers = people on motorcycles. Cool? Thanks! Joe
The cat INSISTS on being on my lap right now.
Yay for finding and fixing errors in your code!
Using maps.google.com to find a bus route.
Oh, Friday evening naps.
I fucking LOVE making progress in my application development!
Cozy morning :)
Falling down is not failure. Staying down is.
Kickin some serious worship music ass right now.
Chosen client meeting tomorrow!!
Hairs need to get cut!
I love pay day :)
Lunch time with music practice :)
Last one out of Michigan shuts off the lights.
East Lansing is quiet tonight. A little bit of peace before the busy-ness of life comes back to us.
Strike up the band! This is a story about the usual struggle between fear and love.
Taking a winter stroll through east lansing. Feeling swell.
Coldplay's "Fix You": amazing song, awful lyrics.
Hairs gettin' CUT.
Some keys to delivering excellent customer service: 1) Listen well, 2) Communicate Often, 3)Admit all mistakes, 4) Give freebies
Argh, friggen Dreamhost. RoR development is a PITA when the host isn't very knowledgeable/supportive of the technology.
Limitless undying love which shines around me like a million suns It calls me on and on across the universe
